mapper.select: SELECT EMP.EMP_NM AS EMPL_NM, DUTY.DUTY_NM AS DUTY_NM, RANK.RANK_NM AS RANK_NM, DAILY.ONW_TI AS ONW_TI, DAILY.OFFW_TI AS OFFW_TI, DAILY.WORK_ST AS WORK_ST, ROUND(((TO_dATE(DAILY.OFFW_TI,'HH24:MI') - TO_DATE(DAILY.ONW_TI,'HH24:MI'))*24))-DAILY.REST_TI AS WORK_TI, DAILY.REST_TI AS REST_TI, PLACE.PLACE_NM AS PLACE_NM, DAILY.REG_DT AS REG_DT FROM WEB_DAILY DAILY INNER JOIN WEB_EMPL_MGM EMP ON DAILY.EMP_SEQ = EMP.EMP_SEQ INNER JOIN WEB_PLACE_MGM PLACE ON DAILY.PLACE_SEQ = PLACE.PLACE_SEQ INNER JOIN WEB_DUTY_MGM DUTY ON EMP.DUTY_SEQ = DUTY.DUTY_SEQ INNER JOIN WEB_RANK_MGM RANK ON EMP.RANK_SEQ = RANK.RANK_SEQ

sql.if: where to_date(DAILY.reg_dt,'yy/mm/dd') = to_date(#{regDt},'yy/mm/dd') and DAILY.DAILY_SEQ>0 and EMP.emp_nm like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

mapper.select: SELECT DAILY_SEQ, EMPL_NM, DUTY_NM, RANK_NM, COMM_TI, WORK_ST, WORK_TI, REST_TI, WORK_PL, REG_DT FROM ( SELECT DAILY.DAILY_SEQ as daily_seq, EMP.EMP_NM AS EMPL_NM, DUTY.DUTY_NM AS DUTY_NM, RANK.RANK_NM AS RANK_NM, DAILY.ONW_TI || ' ~ ' || DAILY.OFFW_TI AS COMM_TI, DAILY.WORK_ST AS WORK_ST, ROUND(((TO_dATE(DAILY.OFFW_TI,'HH24:MI') - TO_DATE(DAILY.ONW_TI,'HH24:MI'))*24))-DAILY.REST_TI AS WORK_TI, DAILY.REST_TI AS REST_TI, PLACE.PLACE_NM AS WORK_PL, TO_CHAR(DAILY.REG_DT,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS REG_DT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DAILY.REG_DT) AS RNUM FROM WEB_DAILY DAILY INNER JOIN WEB_EMPL_MGM EMP ON DAILY.EMP_SEQ = EMP.EMP_SEQ INNER JOIN WEB_PLACE_MGM PLACE ON DAILY.PLACE_SEQ = PLACE.PLACE_SEQ INNER JOIN WEB_DUTY_MGM DUTY ON EMP.DUTY_SEQ = DUTY.DUTY_SEQ INNER JOIN WEB_RANK_MGM RANK ON EMP.RANK_SEQ = RANK.RANK_SEQ ) COMM WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${rowStart} AND ${rowEnd} ORDER BY ${orderKeyword} ${orderMethod}
select count(*) FROM WEB_DAILY DAILY INNER JOIN WEB_EMPL_MGM EMP ON DAILY.EMP_SEQ = EMP.EMP_SEQ

select DAILY.DAILY_SEQ AS DAILY_SEQ, EMP.EMP_NM AS EMPL_NM, DUTY.DUTY_NM AS DUTY_NM, RANK.RANK_NM AS RANK_NM, PLACE.PLACE_NM AS WORK_PL, ROUND(((TO_DATE(DAILY.OFFW_TI,'HH24:MI') - TO_DATE(DAILY.ONW_TI,'HH24:MI'))*24))-DAILY.REST_TI AS WORK_TI, DAILY.REST_TI AS REST_TI, TO_CHAR(DAILY.REG_DT,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS REG_DT FROM WEB_DAILY DAILY INNER JOIN WEB_EMPL_MGM EMP ON DAILY.EMP_SEQ = EMP.EMP_SEQ INNER JOIN WEB_DUTY_MGM DUTY ON EMP.DUTY_SEQ = DUTY.DUTY_SEQ INNER JOIN WEB_RANK_MGM RANK ON EMP.RANK_SEQ = RANK.RANK_SEQ INNER JOIN WEB_PLACE_MGM PLACE ON DAILY.PLACE_SEQ = PLACE.PLACE_SEQ WHERE DAILY.DAILY_SEQ=#{seqNum} and to_date(DAILY.REG_DT,'YY/MM/DD') = TO_DATE(#{regDt},'YY/MM/DD')
update WEB_DAILY set ONW_TI = #{startTime}, OFFW_TI = #{endTime} where DAILY_SEQ = #{dailySeq} and to_date(REG_DT,'yy/mm/dd') = to_Date(#{regDt},'yy/mm/dd')

SELECT DAILY_SEQ, EMPL_NM, DUTY_NM, RANK_NM, COMM_TI, WORK_ST, WORK_TI, REST_TI, WORK_PL, TO_CHAR(REG_DT,'YYYY/MM/DD') FROM ( SELECT DAILY.DAILY_SEQ as daily_seq, EMP.EMP_NM AS EMPL_NM, DUTY.DUTY_NM AS DUTY_NM, RANK.RANK_NM AS RANK_NM, DAILY.ONW_TI || ' ~ ' || DAILY.OFFW_TI AS COMM_TI, DAILY.WORK_ST AS WORK_ST, ROUND(((TO_dATE(DAILY.OFFW_TI,'HH24:MI') - TO_DATE(DAILY.ONW_TI,'HH24:MI'))*24))-DAILY.REST_TI AS WORK_TI, DAILY.REST_TI AS REST_TI, PLACE.PLACE_NM AS WORK_PL, TO_CHAR(DAILY.REG_DT,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS REG_DT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DAILY.REG_DT) AS RNUM FROM WEB_DAILY DAILY INNER JOIN WEB_EMPL_MGM EMP ON DAILY.EMP_SEQ = EMP.EMP_SEQ INNER JOIN WEB_PLACE_MGM PLACE ON DAILY.PLACE_SEQ = PLACE.PLACE_SEQ INNER JOIN WEB_DUTY_MGM DUTY ON EMP.DUTY_SEQ = DUTY.DUTY_SEQ INNER JOIN WEB_RANK_MGM RANK ON EMP.RANK_SEQ = RANK.RANK_SEQ ) COMM
